# serviceType

**Instance Property**

The type of the service.

## Declaration

```swift
var serviceType: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMService/serviceType] property contains a string that indicates what the service does. See [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/accessory-service-types] for a list of possible service types.

## Getting the service type

- **Accessory Service Types**: The service types supported by HomeKit.
- **localizedDescription**: The localized description of the service.
